rooms.description: A spacious entrance that leads to the central courtyard. Vastu-aligned with an open layout, facilitating natural light and energy flow.
Adjacent to the central courtyard. Features floor-to-ceiling windows on one side for ample daylight, designed to evoke a modern yet traditional aesthetic with Chettinad influences.
Connected with the living room. Uses local design materials and integrates seamlessly into the farmhouse concept, promoting communal dining experiences.
Compact yet functional kitchen space, integrating modern amenities with traditional Chettinad design elements. Includes open shelving and local stone finishes.
The heart of the studio apartment farmhouse, featuring a blend of indoor-outdoor space with plants, seating, and open sky views. Designed following Vastu principles to balance energies.
A spacious studio bedroom that doubles as a living and sleeping area for a bachelor pad feel, with ample floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance natural lighting.

openings.description: Main entrance door placed on the west side for positive energy flow, in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
Floor-to-ceiling windows integrated into living and bedroom areas to maximize light and maintain an open feel.
A large opening connecting the central courtyard with the interior spaces, promoting natural ventilation.
